prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Claudia Marquard Architectural Papers, Ms2001-029, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Claudia Marquard Architectural Papers were donated in 2000.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Claudia Marquard Architectural Papers originally occurred in July 2001. This collection was added to the IAWA Small Collections Ms2009-054 in September 2009.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of 2 color photomontages of Marquard's commissions in Berlin: the restoration of a group of apartment buildings on Rosenthaler Street and the restoration of a house for Potsdam Gregor.
